name: feature/index.js
split
description: 千分位过滤器

name: rate
description: 比例过滤器，将数字转换成百分比

params.name: type
params.description: 为true将在倒数第二位添加小数点

name: money
description: 货币过滤器，将数字转换成中文货币样式

params.name: type
params.description: 1为只带千分位分隔符 2为只带￥  默认,.￥全带

name: average
description: 平均数

name: compact
description: 去除数组中的无效/无用值

name: intersection
description: 返回两个数组的交集

name: randIntArr
description: 生成指定范围指定长度的随机数组

name: sample
description: 从指定数组中随机获取元素

name: sampleSize
description: 在指定数组中取出指定长度的随机数组

name: nest
description: 指定父子id生成父子嵌套结构

name: is
description: 验证该值的类型

name: timeTaken
description: 计算函数的执行时间

name: decapitalize
description: 每个单词首字母小写

name: capitalize
description: 字符串首字母大写

params.name: type
params.description: true的话会让剩余字母也成小写

name: caplitalizeAll
description: 每个单词首字母大写

name: luhnCheck
description: 银行卡号校验 Luhn算法

name: dayofYear
description: 获得当前日期天数
examples:
this.$f('dayofYear', new Date())
{{ val | dayofYear(new Date)}}

name: getCurrentHour
description: 返回当前时间的时分秒（24小时制）
examples:
this.$f('getCurrentHour', new Date())
{{ val | getCurrentHour(new Date)}}

name: getDateBetween
description: 返回两个日期间的天数

name: equals
description: 深度判断两个变量是否全等

name: getType
description: 返回值或变量的类型名

name: ranNumRange
description: 生成指定范围的随机整数

name: round
description: 四舍五入指定的小数位数

name: distance
description: 计算任意两点之间的距离

name: isBrowser
description: 检查是否在浏览器环境

name: retard
description: 给回到顶部功能一个减缓效果

params.name: v1
params.description: 速度控制,越小速度越快（回滚每段距离的时间）

params.name: v2
params.description: 速度控制,越大速度越快（每段时间回滚的距离）

name: detectDevice
description: 检测移动/PC设备

name: size
description: 获取不同类型变量的长度

name: escapeHTML
description: HTML转义，预防XSS攻击

name: digitUppercase
description: 数字转换为中文大写

params.name: val
params.description: 整数部分支持76位数，小数部分转换人民币大写支持4位数，不支持的返回*

name: moment
description: 用来格式化日期,需要引入moment库,npm i moment

name: putYear
description: 时间插件增加去年和今年

name: putMonth
description: 时间插件增加最后上个月和這個月

content:
# FILTER-FUNCTION

> A base on js npm pack. Provide more filter methods for your project

## Build Setup

# dev

```sh
# start the project
npm run build-w
# Start a server port for the index.html file in the root directory
Live Server or Http-server
```

# Refer to the esdoc documentation for function comments

https://esdoc.org/manual/tags.html

# Quick Use

```sh
# Generate doc
npm run doc

# Build
npm run build

# Move to dist directory
cd dist

# Create a configuration file.
echo '{
  "name": "hs-filter",
  "description": "A base on js npm pack. Provide more filter methods for your project",
  "version": +++,
  "author": "wxp <15803305146@163.com>",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "private": false,
}' > package.json

# Pack

npm pack

# Install npm pack in your project

npm install -D '.\packName.tgz'

# The exmple in the project
- [vue] import 'name' from 'packName'
- [html] <script src="packName"></script>
```

# License

MIT

# Author

[wxp<15803305146@163.com>]
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "hs-filter",
  "description": "A base on js npm pack. Provide more filter methods for your project",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "author": "wxp <15803305146@163.com>",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "private": false,
  "scripts": {
    "doc": "esdoc",
    "build": "cross-env webpack --progress --hide-modules",
    "build-w": "cross-env webpack --progress --hide-modules -w"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "browserslist": [
    "> 1%",
    "last 2 versions",
    "not ie <= 8"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.6.3",
    "@babel/core": "^7.6.3",
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.7.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.6.3",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.6",
    "cross-env": "^6.0.3",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "file-loader": "^1.1.4",
    "webpack": "^3.6.0",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.9.1",
    "webpack-jarvis": "^0.3.2"
  },
  "directories": {
    "doc": "docs"
  }
}
name: package.json
